00031         public function POMTemplate($text)
00032         {
00033                 $this->children = null; // forcefully ignore children
00034 
00035                 # Remove curly braces at the beginning and at the end
00036                 $text = substr($text, 2, strlen($text) - 4);
00037 
00038                 # Split by pipe
00039                 $parts = split('\|', $text);
00040 
00041                 $this->title = new POMUtilTrimTriple(array_shift($parts));
00042                 $this->id = "template".POMElement::$elementCounter;
00043                 POMElement::$elementCounter++;
00044 //              $this->nodeText = $text;
00045 
00046                 foreach ($parts as $part)
00047                 {
00048                         $this->parameters[] = POMTemplateParameter::parse($part);
00049                 }               
00050         }

00058         {
00059                 return $this->title->trimmed;
00060         }
00066         public function toString()
00067         {
00068                 $text = '{{'.$this->title->toString();
00069 
00070                 for ($i = 0; $i < count($this->parameters); $i++)
00071                 {
00072                         $text .= '|';                   
00073                         $text .= $this->parameters[$i]->toString();
00074                 }
00075 
00076                 $text .= '}}';
00077 
00078                 return $text;
00079         }

00091         public function &getParameterValue($name)
00092         {
00093                 $trimmed_name = trim($name);
00094                 if (strlen($trimmed_name) == 0)
00095                 {
00096                         throw new WrongParameterNameException('Can\'t get parameter with no name');
00097                 }
00098 
00099                 $number = 1;
00100                 for ($i = 0; $i < count($this->parameters); $i++)
00101                 {
00102                         $parameter = &$this->parameters[$i];
00103 
00104                         # checking this in runtime to make sure we cover all post-parsing updates to the list
00105                         if (is_a($parameter, 'POMTemplateNamedParameter'))
00106                         {
00107                                 if ($parameter->getName() == $trimmed_name)
00108                                 {
00109                                         return $parameter->getValueByReference();
00110                                 }
00111                         }
00112                         else if (is_a($parameter, 'POMTemplateNumberedParameter'))
00113                         {
00114                                 if ($number == $trimmed_name)
00115                                 {
00116                                         return $parameter->getValueByReference();
00117                                 }
00118                                 $number++;
00119                         }
00120                 }
00121 
00122                 return NULL; # none matched
00123         }
00124 
00131         public function &getParameter($name)
00132         {
00133                 $trimmed_name = trim($name);
00134                 if (strlen($trimmed_name) == 0)
00135                 {
00136                         throw new WrongParameterNameException('Can\'t get parameter with no name');
00137                 }
00138 
00139                 $number = 1;
00140                 for ($i = 0; $i < count($this->parameters); $i++)
00141                 {
00142                         $parameter = &$this->parameters[$i];
00143 
00144                         # checking this in runtime to make sure we cover all post-parsing updates to the list
00145                         if (is_a($parameter, 'POMTemplateNamedParameter'))
00146                         {
00147                                 if ($parameter->getName() == $trimmed_name)
00148                                 {
00149                                         return $parameter;
00150                                 }
00151                         }
00152                         else if (is_a($parameter, 'POMTemplateNumberedParameter'))
00153                         {
00154                                 if ($number == $trimmed_name)
00155                                 {

00157                                 }
00158                                 $number++;
00159                         }
00160                 }
00161 
00162                 return NULL; # none matched
00163         }
00164         
00178         public function setParameter($name, $value,
00179         $ignore_name_spacing = true,
00180         $ignore_value_spacing = true,
00181         $override_name_spacing = false, # when original value exists
00182         $override_value_spacing = false # when original value exists
00183         )
00184         {
00185                 $trimmed_name = trim($name);
00186                 if (strlen($trimmed_name) == 0)
00187                 {
00188                         throw new WrongParameterNameException("Can't set parameter with no name");
00189                 }
00190 
00191                 if ($ignore_name_spacing)
00192                 {
00193                         $name = $trimmed_name;
00194                 }
00195 
00196                 if ($ignore_value_spacing)
00197                 {
00198                         $value = trim($value);
00199                 }
00200 
00201                 # first go through named parameters and see if name matches
00202                 for ($i = 0; $i < count($this->parameters); $i++)
00203                 {
00204                         if (is_a($this->parameters[$i], 'POMTemplateNamedParameter') &&
00205                         $this->parameters[$i]->getName() == $trimmed_name)
00206                         {
00207                                 $this->parameters[$i]->update($name, $value, $override_name_spacing, $override_value_spacing);
00208                                 return;
00209                         }
00210                 }
00211 
00212                 # then go through numbered parameters and see if parameter with this number exists
00213                 $number = 1;
00214                 for ($i = 0; $i < count($this->parameters); $i++)
00215                 {
00216                         if (is_a($this->parameters[$i], 'POMTemplateNumberedParameter'))
00217                         {
00218                                 if ($number == $trimmed_name)
00219                                 {
00220                                         $this->parameters[$i]->update($value, $override_value_spacing);
00221                                         return;
00222                                 }
00223                                 $number++;
00224                         }
00225                 }
00226 
00227                 # now, if passed name is numeric, create numbered parameter, otherwise create named parameter
00228                 # add parameter to parameters array
00229                 if (is_numeric($trimmed_name) && ((int)$trimmed_name) == $trimmed_name)
00230                 {
00231                         $this->parameters[] = new POMTemplateNumberedParameter($value);
00232                 }
00233                 else
00234                 {
00235                         $this->parameters[] = new POMTemplateNamedParameter($name, $value);
00236                 }
00237         }
00238 }

00242         // Redefine the exception so message isn't optional

00247                 parent::__construct($message, $code);

00250         // custom string representation of object
